title: Fact Checked: SRK has not donated Rs 111 crore to fight coronavirus | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A screengrab of news bulletin by Aaj Tak is doing rounds on social media with a claim that Bollywood actor Shahrukh Khan has donated Rs 111 crore to fight coronavirus.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found the claim to be false.

We ran a search and did not find any credible reports to submit the viral claim.

We also found that the picture of SRK used in the screengrab is from 2017 Eid celebration. He also held a press conference to interact with the media.

We also checked the social media accounts of SRK and did not find any such announcement.

In conclusion, we can say that this news false.
